welcome.title: Your Community in Sk√∂vde
welcome.description: ESN Sk√∂vde is a student organization dedicated to supporting international students. We create a welcoming community where you can meet new friends, participate in exciting activities, and make the most of your time in Sweden. Our dedicated board members are here to help you navigate your exchange experience.

events.title: Join Our Events
events.description: From cultural excursions to social gatherings, we offer a variety of events throughout the semester. Experience Swedish traditions, explore the country's beautiful landscapes, and connect with fellow students from around the world. Check our upcoming events and don't miss out on the fun!

cityTour.title: New to Sk√∂vde?
cityTour.description: Moving to a new city can be challenging, especially in a foreign country. Our city orientation tours and practical information sessions will help you get familiar with Sk√∂vde quickly. Learn about the best places to eat, shop, study, and have fun, along with essential tips for daily life in Sweden.

testimonials.title: Students Corner
testimonials.subtitle: Hear what students say about us

boardMembers.title: Board Members
boardMembers.mascotDescription: Our mascot symbolizes our community and spirit. It represents the heart of our organization.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.sendMessageSocial: Send Us a Message on Social Media

carousel.checkBackLater: Check back later for new trips and events

events.shareNotSupported: Unable to share on this device. Link copied instead.

newToCity.title: Welcome to Sk√∂vde!
newToCity.subtitle: Your complete guide to settling into student life in Sweden. Everything you need to know to make your stay enjoyable and stress-free.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Welcome to Sk√∂vde! Starting your journey in a new city can be both exciting and overwhelming. This comprehensive guide is designed to help you navigate your new home with confidence and ease.

cityHighlights.title: City Highlights
cityHighlights.description: Sk√∂vde is a charming Swedish city that perfectly balances modern amenities with natural beauty. Located in the heart of V√§sterg√∂tland, it offers everything an international student needs for a memorable experience.
cityHighlights.richHeritageDescription: Discover centuries of Swedish history through museums, historical sites, and cultural landmarks.
cityHighlights.naturalBeautyDescription: From hiking trails to skiing slopes, nature is always within reach for outdoor enthusiasts.
cityHighlights.studentLifeDescription: A vibrant student community with numerous activities, events, and support networks.
whatMakesSkovdeSpecialList: Perfect size - not too big, not too small
Easy access to both Stockholm and Gothenburg
Affordable cost of living for Sweden

placesToExplore.title: Places to Explore
placesToExplore.description: Sk√∂vde and its surroundings offer numerous attractions and activities for every interest. Here are some must-visit places to explore during your stay.

places.name: Billingen
places.description: BillingeHus, Nature trails, outdoor gym, ice skating rink + skiing

places.name: Arena Sk√∂vde
places.description: Modern sports and entertainment complex in the heart of the city

places.name: Nature Reserve Silverfallet
places.description: Beautiful natural area perfect for hiking and outdoor activities

explorationTipsList: Check seasonal opening hours for outdoor activities
Many places offer student discounts with your ESN card
Weather can change quickly - dress in layers
Follow local social media accounts for events and updates

transport.title: Transport
transport.description: Getting around Sk√∂vde and Sweden is easy with the comprehensive public transportation system. Here's everything you need to know about transportation options.

regional.title: V√§sttrafik (Regional)
regional.coverageDescription: Buses and trains within the V√§stra G√∂taland region
regional.appDescription: Download the V√§sttrafik app for easy ticket purchases and journey planning
regional.studentDiscount: Student discount available on period tickets with valid student ID

national.title: SJ (National)
national.coverageDescription: Train connections across all of Sweden
national.appDescription: Download the SJ app for booking and managing train tickets
national.studentDealDescription: Last-minute tickets for students released 24 hours before departure at reduced prices

tipsList: Download both apps before you need them
Always have a backup payment method ready
Check for student ID requirements when buying discounted tickets
Plan your journeys in advance, especially for longer trips
Keep your ticket visible during the entire journey
Weekend schedules may differ from weekday timetables

settlingIn.title: Settling In
settlingIn.description: The first few weeks in a new country can be overwhelming. These practical tips will help you settle in more comfortably and make the most of your time in Sk√∂vde.
firstWeekChecklistList: Get your student ID and university login
makingYourPlaceHomeList: Buy basic household items at IKEA or similar
Learn your address and local area

dealingWithSwedishWeather.title: Dealing with Swedish Weather
winterPreparationList: Invest in good winter boots and coat

managingYourBudget.title: Managing Your Budget
moneySavingTipsList: Cook at home - eating out is expensive

emergencyContacts.title: Emergency Contacts
emergencyContacts.description: It's important to know who to contact in case of emergencies or when you need help. Save these important numbers and keep them easily accessible.
emergencyContacts.universitySupportDescription: For academic support, student services, and non-emergency assistance
importantNotesList: 112 works from any phone, even without a SIM card or credit
Save these numbers in your phone contacts
Let someone know your whereabouts when traveling alone
Keep emergency numbers written down as backup

buddyProgram.title: Buddy Program
buddyProgram.description: Don't navigate your new life in Sk√∂vde alone! Connect with support programs and fellow students who can help make your transition smoother.

esn.title: ESN Buddy Program
esn.description: Connect with local students who can help you navigate university life and Swedish culture.

internationalCommunity.title: International Community
internationalCommunity.description: Connect with fellow international students who can help you navigate university life and Swedish culture.
infoList: Attend ESN events and social gatherings
Use Facebook groups to meet others

whenYouNeedHelp.title: When You Need Help
whenYouNeedHelp.description: Remember, asking for help is normal and encouraged! Here's who to contact:

makingTheMostOfSupport.title: Making the Most of Support
makingTheMostOfSupport.description: Remember, asking for help is normal and encouraged! Here's who to contact:
list: Don't be afraid to ask questions - everyone is there to help
Attend orientation sessions and social events
Be patient with yourself - adjustment takes time
Share your own culture and experiences with others
Stay in touch with your buddy and new friends

shopping.title: Shopping
shopping.description: Sk√∂vde offers a variety of shopping options for all your daily needs. From groceries to specialty items, here's where to find what you need.

ica.title: ICA
ica.description: ICA Maxi, ICA N√§ra, ICA Kvantum - Different sizes for different needs

lidl.title: Lidl
lidl.description: Low price with good quality products.

coop.title: Coop
coop.description: Cooperative grocery store with good selection

siamFood.title: Siam Food
siamFood.description: Located in centrum - Asian groceries and ingredients

alcohol.title: Alcohol - Important Rules
alcohol.swedishAlcoholLawsDescription: Sweden only allows alcohol sales at designated stores called Systembolaget. There are two in Sk√∂vde, one in centrum and one near Elins Esplanad. The legal age to purchase from here is 20 years old.

importantRequirements.title: Important Requirements
importantRequirements.legalAge: Legal age is 20 years for Systembolaget (18 or 19 for some bars/club)

shoppingTips.title: Shopping Tips
tipsListOne: Bring a coin for shopping carts (usually 10 SEK)
Check store hours - they may close early on Sundays
Student discounts available at some stores
tipsListTwo: Download store apps for digital receipts and offers
Fresh produce is weighed and labeled by customers
Recycling stations available at most stores

usefulApps.title: Useful Apps
usefulApps.description: Stay connected and informed with these essential apps and social media accounts. These resources will help you integrate into the student community and stay updated on events and opportunities.
usefulApps.facebookGroupsDescription: Join these groups to connect with other students and stay informed about local events and opportunities.
usefulApps.facebookGroupsTips: Search for these groups on Facebook and request to join
usefulApps.instagramAccountsTips: Follow these accounts for updates on events, deadlines, and student life
socialMediaTipsList: Join Facebook groups early to get the most information
Follow Instagram accounts for visual updates and stories
Turn on notifications for important groups and accounts
Use social media to find study groups and social events
Don't hesitate to ask questions in the groups - students are helpful!
Check these accounts regularly for last-minute updates

accommodation.title: Accommodation
accommodation.description: Finding the right place to live is crucial for your student experience. Here are the main options and strategies for securing accommodation in Sk√∂vde.

skovdebostader.title: Sk√∂vdebost√§der (Primary Option)
howItWorksList: Rank the apartments you've applied for
Wait for offers based on your points
skovdebostader.pointSystemDescription: People with the most points have first priority in being offered contracts. The longer you're registered, the more points you accumulate.
skovdebostader.newListingsDescription: New apartments are usually posted on Fridays. Check regularly for new opportunities.

alternativeOptions.title: Alternative Options
alternativeOptions.universityAccommodationDescription: Usually reserved for exchange students and international programs.
alternativeOptions.universityAccommodationContact: Contact international office if you're eligible
alternativeOptions.bostadsZonenDescription: Online platform for student housing across Sweden.
alternativeOptions.bostadsZonenContact: Check their website for more information

socialOptions.title: Social & Shared Housing
socialOptions.description: Many students rent out their apartments or look for roommates on Facebook groups.

emergencyContact.title: Need Help?
emergencyContact.description: If other options fail, contact the university's housing coordinator can help:

housingSearchTips.title: Housing Search Tips
tipsListOne: Start your search as early as possible
Be flexible with location and type

studentLife.title: Student Life
studentLife.description: Make the most of your university experience at University of Sk√∂vde! Here are essential tips for academic success and campus life.

academicSuccess.title: Academic Success
tipsList: Attend all lectures and seminars
Form study groups with classmates
Use university library resources
Meet with professors during office hours
Submit assignments on time
Take advantage of academic support services
Participate actively in class discussions

campusResources.title: Campus Resources
tipsList: Student health services
Career counseling center
IT support and computer labs
Student dining halls and caf√©s
Study spaces and group rooms
Sports and fitness facilities
Student organization offices

studentOrganizations.title: Student Organizations
studentOrganizations.description: Get involved with student organizations to enhance your university experience and make lasting connections.

successTips.title: Success Tips
tipsList: Stay organized with a planner or digital calendar
Connect with international students and local Swedes
Take advantage of student discounts everywhere
Learn basic Swedish - locals appreciate the effort
Explore Sweden during breaks and weekends
Document your experience - you'll want to remember it!

esnCard.tagline: Your key to Erasmus Network exclusive discounts and benefits
esnCard.benefit1: Free or discounted entry on events and trips
esnCard.benefit4: Access to a network of international students
esnCard.partnersDescription: Show your ESN Card and get exclusive discounts at these amazing partners
